summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1613, for the improvement of North 50th Street and North 49th Street, each from Fremont Avenue to Stone Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 17176 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
